doc:
Vera Miles https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vera_Miles 0 Vera June Miles (née Ralston, born August 23, 1929) is a retired American actress who worked closely with Alfred Hitchcock, most notably as Lila Crane in the classic 1960 film Psycho, reprising the role in the 1983 sequel Psycho II. Other films in which she appeared include Tarzan's Hidden Jungle (1955), The Searchers (1956), Alfred Hitchcock's The Wrong Man (also 1956), The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance (1962), Follow Me, Boys! (1966), Sergeant Ryker (1968) and Molly and Lawless John (1972). Vera_June_Miles ( née_Ralston , born August_23_,_1929 ) is a_retired_American_actress who worked closely with Alfred_Hitchcock , most_notably as Lila_Crane in the_classic_1960_film_Psycho , reprising the_role in the_1983_sequel_Psycho_II . Other_films in which she appeared_include Tarzan 's_Hidden_Jungle_(_1955_) , The_Searchers ( 1956_) , Alfred_Hitchcock 's_The_Wrong_Man ( also_1956_) , The_Man Who Shot Liberty_Valance_(_1962_) , Follow Me , Boys ! (_1966_) , Sergeant_Ryker_(_1968_)_and_Molly and Lawless_John_(_1972_) .
